name: Storage Sense Huntsville
text: They Were Efficient and Provided Excellent Quality Service, Rich was Great !!!!!

name: Mimi Shady Walnut
text:
I was happy that the response time was fast.  I was given all the prices up front and the work was performed by a skillful, friendly gentleman that went above and beyond to make sure I understood the process. I will use them in the future and I would recommend them to family and friends.
Thank you Mr. McGuire or a job well done.

name: Karen Pedersen
text: Another great job by The Flying Locksmiths.  We had hired them to change our locks when we moved into our new home and mentioned that we needed to get a doggie door installed as well. Found out they also install doors so asked them to price out a door and installation. The owner called to work out exactly what we were looking for and ordered the door. Two weeks later the door is installed and it’s everything we wanted and more. There were a couple of hitches that came up during installation but they were handled professionally and thoroughly. We are beyond impressed with the quality of service we have received from this company and can highly recommend them!

name: Heather Dugan
text: Highly recommend this company. Price was reasonable and Ken was friendly, punctual, and professional.

name: Angie Vann
text: Alright I guess. They didn't seem enthusiastic about helping, even after I they couldn't assist and I asked for recommendations. Oh well it is what it is.

name: Drew Ballance
text: Great transaction! Emailed to set up an appointment for re-keying a new home after closing. Got a call to nail down the appointment just a few minutes (not hours or the next day) after I emailed.When the appointment time came - the technician showed up 10 minutes early and was quick, efficient, professional, and personable. 30 minutes or so later the job was done and everything was ready to go. Would not hesitate to utilize Flying Locksmiths again!

name: Richard Eade
text: I called and the technician came the same day.   The work was excellent and the price good.   The technician went the extra mile and really helped me out by calling me when he noticed I left my briefcase on the trunk of my car when I drove off.   Life saver.   Highly recommended.

name: Wendy Strach
text: Ken Aldridge is a fantastic locksmith. He arrived within 20 minutes after I talked to him about my door/lock issue . He fixed my door along with replacing the knob and lock. He was very personable and I was highly satisfied with his work. This is a great company. I will be using them from now on for any door/ lock issues that arise.

resp.text: Thank you, Wendy, for your review! We look forward to be able to work with you again if you need our services!

name: Lisa Nicolella
text: I had previously called another highly rated locksmith in the area to have my locks rekeyed. They were not very flexible on time and quoted me a high price. I called The Flying Locksmith and Ken came out today to rekey my locks. He was done in half the time that I thought he would be, and charge me a very fair price. I will call them again if I ever need a locksmith!

name: Leslie Smith
text: Great response and job performance by Lanette and technician, Ken Aldridge who was very helpful and answered all my questions.  They were able to follow with same day service and had Ken at my house in 2 hours.  They are my go to locksmiths.  Thank you Flying Locksmith.

resp.text: We are happy to hear you enjoyed our staff and that they could help answer all your questions. Thank you Leslie!

name: CHAITANYA BRAHMBHATT
text: Very nice service... no waste of time ... service really on time with very good customer service... thank you

name: Paul Zbell
text: This is second time we’ve used flying locksmiths and there work has always been done on schedule , priced fairly , and completed in a professional manner. Will be using them again.

name: lindsey fowler
text: Great service! I was given a time window from 8-5 and received a call at 10 stating they would arrive in 30 mins. Showed up on time and got the job done quickly and was very professional. Also, the quoted price on the phone from two days before never changed.

name: Walter Simmons
text: Woke up hungover, was late for work, had lost my keys downtown... I had a spare key... in my car of course... I called and they were there and had my door unlocked within 20 minutes. Saved my day!

name: Michael Gandy
text: Great Job! Fast Professional and Courteous

name: Greg Patterson
text: Having just purchased the house I wanted the security of knowing who had keys. Plus none of the doors were keyed alike. Enter the fantastic technicians from the Flying Locksmith of North Alabama. They arrived on time, went right to work rekeying 13 cylinders and cutting all the keys I needed. They even resolved an issue with a lock that I didn't know I had. Their professionalism is beyond reproach and their prices are very reasonable. And above all, they were super nice guys who knew their jobs and did them well. They should be anyone's first choice in need of a locksmith.

name: Yashica Robinson
text: Very prompt and professional.

resp.text: Thank you Yashica!

name: Jacqueline Shamburger
text: Great place for burial vaults and parking bumpers.

name: Tyler Grayson
text: Professional yet friendly service. Quality product for a reasonable price

name: Kenneth Johnson
text: Great place for Burial Vaults. Great service

name: Audrey Vanzant
text:
We did like athens locksmith..but
It has changed so much since  ( cindy )worked there
We miss her so much
And since it has been sold to
( Ted locksmith )
It's not the same no more
MOST TIME THEY DON'T HAVE RIGHT
KEY IN AND WHEN YOU ASK
YOUNG BOY AND YOUNG MAN
WILL TELL YOU " DON'T KNOW"

MS.CINDY ALWAYS KEPT CHECK ON KEY EVERY DAY BUT SHE PASSED AWAY
WAY BACK!

name: Bill Alexander
text: I have used this business several times in the past and was well pleased and recommended them to others. When I called on Nov 25 it seemed to have a change in ownership. Even though it was after the posted opening hours the person was not in the office yet and was unsure if he had the key I needed in stock. He said he would call me back from the office in less than an hour.  After over an hour of waiting I found a different locksmith closer to my home and got a better price!  By the Way, I had told him that I work 3rd shift and had been up all night. Obviously he has enough business and didn't care to make a new chip key for my truck.  I won't be back

name: james hughes
text: I need a keys made for an RV that I had no key for I needed a key made for a lock that I had no key for they did both of them they will always get my work

name: Austin Pericule
text: Legendary service. They were quick to help me when Lowe's wouldn't, and they were cheaper, too! I will definitely be recommending this place, and they can most definitely expect to see me in the future.

name: Blake Mitchell
text: Being locked locked out of a vehicle is both embarrassing and inconvenient, especiallywhile working. I really appreciated the fact that they were where they said they would be within the time they gave. Trey was very friendly and did a great job. He had me back on the road within 35mins of the initial call. I'll definitely keep them in mind next time I need a locksmith.

name: George Dugger
text: Good folks that are good at keys and things

name: Monica Jackson
text: Locked myself out of my house one cold wintry morning. Called Athens Locksmith. Didn't have to wait too long before someone came and let me in my house. Price not too bad.

name: Halie Smith
text: The guys were nice and quick! Had my door unlocked within just a few moments of arriving. I feel like it was a fair price and they didnt scratch the truck or damage it in any way getting into the door. Very thankful since I was in my boyfriend's truck. 😅

name: Dewite P
text: Fast service. Friendly. Lesson learned -$55.00 for being unprepared. Had 3 keys made after guy left. Never again I hope.

name: carmen velez
text: Nice people and very helpful

name: Daniel Matthews
text: Great customer service and reasonable prices. Thank you!

name: Jessica Howell
text: Hooked me up with a replacement key for the lolo!!

name: Jennifer Hill (Sissy)
text: Called Christmas eve said was fixing leave go outta town,but yet couldn't send another truck or anything! An talked Rather hateful

name: Dylan Legg
text: I went in to get two keys made, learned a lesson on keys and didn’t get charged for one of the keys to be made.

name: Joel Fitchie
text: Good service and price friendly

name: Demetria Crutcher
text: Because they have the brands i like with bargains

name: Bradley Owens
text: I like the guard dog

name: John Smith
text: I had a great experience with Buford’s. JD (I think his name was) was quick and efficient. He also did a great job of communicating with me throughout the process of ordering me a new key fob and coming to my house to program it. Additionally, he came in UNDER budget! That’s never happened to me with a locksmith before. Very impressed!

name: Elroyce Williams
text: My experience with Buford has always been a pleasant one. They are professional and helpful with timely advice and repairs that you don't have too return for them to get it right. They get it right the first time...

name: Ashley Harris
text:
Always knowledgeable and willing to go the extra mile (pun intended).
Staff is always courteous and friendly.

name: Teisa Teonna
text: I called them to my location and they was out there in less than 10 minutes. The gentleman was able to unlock my car doors in seconds, professional and proficient.

name: Hannah Berman
text: Used this company to replace a front door knob. Technician was great but walked off with my extra key and told me to pick it up at the office. Showed up to the office, but I was two minutes late. Woman came out with an attitude telling me they were closed, yelled at me about not having paid when I paid yesterday, and the technician had the key in his van, so both our times were wasted, even though I paid for the service and the technician had my key. I will spend the $5 to have my own copy made just not to deal with this place again.

name: Seth Lockett
text: They literally saved me hundreds of dollars!!!! I highly recommend this company! Fast, friendly service with a very knowledgeable staff.

name: Justin Russell
text: Got us back up and running with access to our tools in 15 minutes! These people are amazing

name: bird 23gut
text: Excellent, friendly customer service and quick  response time.

name: Randie Watkins
text: I just called and the lady that answered the phone was rude as heck. I will not be using this company.

name: Ann C
text: I had to have a new fob for my Lexus. I ordered a fob to be programmed trying to save money. JD came out & programmed my bought fob. It only unlocked to doors when done. It was raining, late in the evening... close to 6 pm, and I was completely exhausted. JD went above and beyond. He went back to the office, got me a good fob came back & programmed it. He was very patient & went above & beyond the call of duty. Thank you JD. Buford's you ROCK!!!

name: LaMeyah Law
text: I will recommend them to anyone. The guy who came out was very polite and understanding. So for that thank you thank you thank you !

name: Melba Ward
text: High, Expensive, Fast

name: Mary Smith
text: Call them out to open safe they opened the safe did not leave clear directions with combination cost$150.00 called them again because it would not open with the combination given came back out after multiple tries opened the safe wrote out directions even though he had trouble opening it cost $85.00 then on third call after multiple people attempted the combination left could not get into the safe they will come back out for another charge . Not happy at all they should come do the job correctly or explain the dial is messed up or something . Not recommended

name: Jessica Lopez
text: I was locked out in the rain and they were there in no time.  Thank you Buford's Locksmith

name: Shane Smith
text:
My wife and Daughter were in town for a volleyball turnement. My Daughter locked the key fob in the SUV. I called 5 other companies
That told me they couldn't get their employees
To answer their phone or they just didn't want
To work. So when JD answered and took care
Of my family within 30 minutes of calling him.
I was blown away with his quick response time. He was so nice it put mind at ease.

name: Jarvis Jones
text: The owner or whomever answered the phone with an attitude and talked with disrespect. Jacked the previous price of $400 to $500 because he was upset... Terrible professionalism. A freaking shame.

name: Johnbibby08 @gmail.com Tuscaloosa 06
text: Bufords Locksmith and Security great business to deal with affordable prices and fast customer service. I will be a repeat customer from now on. Thanks for the help today.

name: Kenneth Ridgell
text: Best response time in town, by far. Advanced in ability to work with even smart cars such as our Mercedes Benz. No one else in town would attempt to work on it and told me we were stuck until Monday. Thank God for professionals like this company!

name: Jayla Hargrove
text: The Worst Locksmith Company EVER.I Called For Service For My Car They Took My Information But No One Ever Showed Up I Waited A Hour & A Half For A Locksmith And He Never Called Or Nothing.This Is Very Unprofessional Please Do Better As A Company Too Take Care Of Your Customers..

name: Remy Helu
text: Great people great service great price!!

name: Lee R
text: Very professional in the service they provide. I hope I don't need keys for this vehicle again, but they are now my Go to company for key and security topics. I was not aware of all they provide untill this visit.

name: william ivory
text: Great job

name: Jasmyne “FatGirlish” bay
text: So helpful!!!! I called them 10 mins before closing asking if I could come in for a new replacement key. She told me come on! I get there and was told I would need my car to get new key programmed.. well I didn't have my car because I broke the only key I had for the car! In complete dispar one of the guys came out and asked if I had the key that broke I almost screamed yes.. he says well we can take the chip out of that one and put it in a new key!!! I almost hugged him!! lol I had just left a dealership that was trying to charge me $175 for a new key and never told me this could have been an option!! I walked out of there at 5:05 with a new key that's works!!! Thanks so much guys!!

name: Brandon Owens
text: Kept getting different times in when they would arrive.  Never showed before getting a commitment out of another locksmith.

name: Derek Wong
text: Professional and Reasonable priced, highly recommend.

name: Jordan Alexander
text: If I ever get locked out of my apartment again (hopefully not), I'm calling them.

name: Renee Rivera
text: Quick and easy .

name: Yasemin Webb
text: 0 customer  service

name: brental1
text: 4 stars only because it's impossible to contact them by phone.  Finally reached someone at Fairfax TV (the locksmith's father's business).  Once  I was able to make contact ,  which took over a week, they did a great job for me.

name: Curtis D. Levy
text: Haven't Been Able To Catch Someone There ¿¿¿

name: JERRY GUTHRIE
text: We are in the residential rehab rental and flip business. We carry our locks to David in 5 gallon buckets for re-keying. We also use him for all other locksmith services. He has been our locksmith since 2008. He is reliable and accurate  with every job and really cares about his customers... From Rock Creek Development LLC

name: Taylor Strickland
text: I traveled from Sylacauga to Bessemer to have a key made and programmed for my truck, but nobody was there when I arrived. After calling the number on the business card, they came back and helped me get my key made with a very reasonable price. These guys are outstanding, and I would recommend them to anyone needing locksmith service done. Definitely worth the drive! Thank you guys!

name: Sonya Ross
text: The were friendly fast and efficient! Even when the lock had already been removed! Thank U!!! Blessing to  UAll

name: Jeff Marks
text: Lost keys (house and car) rekeyed my house ( in 1 minute) and car door.(a few minutes) Very affordable. Professional. Very quick.

name: Amy Pearson
text: The ONLY company I could call!! Very trustworthy and that really counts when it comes to this field! I highly recommend them!

name: Devin McCarty
text: Don’t thank I have ever been this mad at a place!! Told him be at his shop at 12 sit 2 hours waiting and calling him. Work owl shift with no sleep and no remote that was said to be when got at place.so live far away! So done told him I would be at 12.  Have the 2nd star bc I try to give everyone the benefit of the doubt super aggravated.

name: Joshua Parrish
text: Ive been doing business with these guys for years. Hands down best in the business, very friendly and honest, Good prices i wouldnt trust anybody else to touch my vehicles!

name: Bo Adkins
text:
STAY AWAY! TAKE Your buisness else where. Its 5:31 Big bright light in window says OPEN, lights on inside but door locked and nobody in site. Knocked on door, NOTHING. 5mins later and As I sit here looking back up at the door, lights go off and sign goes off.

POOR POOR service and small businesses wonder why people now go to the big box stores for service.
Thanks for your service NORTH AMERICAN SECURITY!!!!!!

name: Dalton Chandler
text: Came to my house and got me fixed up!! Great people and very reasonable.

name: Derian Carden
text: Outstanding service! Super fast and friendly!

name: Sandra Terry
text: Always made all my keys and changed my locks, never no problems!

name: Dakota Carden
text: Great service with great guys

name: Bro. George Smith
text: Had just what I needed.

name: Kayla Gardner
text: Fantastic  Service and great guys

name: Nita Nita
text:
Awesome!!!
Quick and efficient!!!!!

name: James Hopkins
text: Sign says open but no one is there or answering phone

name: Meighan Warren
text: I bought an old home and the interior doors and jambs weren't made for newer hardware. These guys were fast, efficient and inexpensive. I highly recommend!

name: Ryan Campbell
text: The experience with this company was quality from the start. The gentleman on the phone was courteous and helpful. The team that came out called ahead and actually came early, which worked out perfect. In spite of the fact that they had misinformation about the service needed, they happily took care of my needs quickly, efficiently, and for a fair price. Great job, and I will use these guys for any future needs.

resp.text: Thank you, Ryan! Glad we could provide great service!

name: Howard Hapner
text: Our locksmith installation is fantastic.  On time, professional and made some great suggestions for us.   I highly recommend the Flying Locksmiths for your home safety lock repairs and installation.

name: Staci Lawrence
text: Jeff was amazing! Very friendly and got us taken care of quickly. I highly recommend for all your locksmith needs!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind feedback, Staci!

name: John Gillon
text:
This is the 2nd time I've used The Flying Locksmiths and let's just say I'm "SOLD!"

With others, you don't know who you're gonna get, when they'll show up, or what you'll be charged.

Jeff is always on time and goes above and beyond what one would think is normal for any service call. The biggest plus, pricing is more than fair in comparison to what I've been charged by others!!!

Plain and simple...Jeff's the man!! I will use, nor refer anyone else for locksmith service!!!

name: Tamekka Hayden
text: Wonderful customer service and very efficient

name: dan phelps
text: Willis came out and got my door unlocked in no time without even drilling the knob... very professional and over all great work ethic. His prompt showtime, great work ethic and friendly demeanor is exactly what the world needs more of. Two thumbs up thank you willis

resp.text: Happy to hear you enjoyed the service provided and are happy we didn't need to drill your knob to get in unlocked. Thank you for the feedback Dan!

name: Patrick Graham
text: The Flying Locksmiths were awesome! The Technician, Jeff, did a great job and was extremely courteous. He came to our house and did the job in no time. I will definitely be referring them and using in the future.

name: Valerie Boyd
text: I don’t normally take the time to give reviews but These guys were so quick to respond. My front door lock broke and I called several local places that could not get to me for a few days. Flying Locksmiths came in a few hours. And Willis was very knowledgeable, friendly and quick!! Definitely recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Valerie, for your review! We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to helping you out if you need it!

name: Rebekah Hewett
text: The Flying Locksmiths came out to replace several old locks on our doors. They were quick and did great work! Customer service could not have been better. They were great about communication...not only were they on time, but they let you know when they are on their way! Will definitely use them again!

resp.text: We are happy to assist you quickly while providing great customer service. Thank you for the kind review Rebekah!

name: Gracie Julian
text: I had an incredible experience with The Flying Locksmith’s. Everyone I talked to/the locksmiths that came out were so kind, easy to communicate with, and excellent at what they do. Tarence and Willis went above and beyond to ensure our locks were changed properly. We are grateful to have found this company and would highly recommend!

resp.text: We are so happy to hear you have had an incredible experience with us! Thank you for the kind review Gracie!

name: Lisa M. Carter
text: John was awesome! He gave excellent customer service and went above and beyond to ensure that my husband and I felt secure in our home. I would highly recommend The Flying Locksmiths to all avidly seeking a locksmith!

resp.text: Thank you, Lisa, for your review! We hope to be able to help you again in the future if you need our locksmith services!

name: Allen M
text: Wouldn't come out when needed

name: Elizabeth Pate
text: Flying Locksmiths are always quick to respond and Willis and Terrence are helpful beyond the service call. We use them for all our business needs and will be my first call when I need a locksmith personally. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review Elizabeth! We appreciate the high recommendation and you using us for all your business needs!

name: Jared Shiver
text: I couldn’t get into my camper, Willis came out early on a Saturday morning and helped me get in! Great communication between staff and all of them were willing to help to help the costumer. Great group of people! Will call again if I need anything!

resp.text: Glad we could help assist you with getting into your camper! Thank you for the kind review Jared!

name: Stacey Reed
text: Flying Locksmith is awesome!  My front door lock stopped working, and they had someone at my house in 30 minutes!  Tarence was the nicest technician, knowledgeable and helpful.  I would highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind 5 star review Stacey!

name: Yousif Aboosi
text: I was locked out of my apartment on a Friday night. Called three locksmiths and no answer. I called the flying locksmith and someone actually answered immediately ( not a machine but a person at 11:30 pm on a Friday). They were super professional and helpful. Definetly recommend them.

resp.text: We are happy we could quickly assist you Yousif! Thank you for the 5 star rating!

name: Ernest Derrico
text: They were on time got the job done in reasonable amount of time. Courteous had me to try the locks an explained to me about the condition of the locks but was able to rekey them. Was satisfied with the job.

resp.text: We are happy to hear you are satisfied with the job completed and that we could quickly get the job done. Thank you for the feedback Ernest!

name: Sonya Jordan
text: Scheduling was easy and they accommodated a late afternoon time for me.  Willis was on time, nice, and efficient.  He got my door unlocked and made me extra keys at a reasonable price.

resp.text: We are glad we could help get your door unlocked and make your new key at a reasonable price! Thank you for the kind review Sonya!

name: Debi Kozler
text:
Called five different locksmiths.   Needed in home quickly and was being told late evening and even Monday.   Flying was up for the challenge.
I was in before noon.  Super accommodating and professional.   I now have their number in my phone.

They also help if you are locked out of your car.

resp.text: We are happy we could accommodate you and help you unlock your car Debi!

name: Guice Potter
text: The best service you could possibly ever have.

resp.text: Thank you! Please let us know how we could assist you in the future.

name: John Clay
text: Was locked out of my home after-hours and needed a 24-hr locksmith. Flying Locksmiths arrived quicker than they said they would and were into my door within 5 minutes, and the service guy was very friendly and professional. Thanks for the save!

resp.text: John, thank you for the kind review! Glad we could quickly come out to help you get back in your home!

name: Rod Patton
text: Willis and Tarence did an awesome job at my house.  They installed a wireless Lock which was perfect. I highly recommend The Flying Locksmiths to do your work.

resp.text: Thank you, Rod, for your review! Be sure to reach out to us if you need a locksmith in the future!

name: Micah Mccaleb
text: Fantastic experience. 100% recommend them. Jeff did a fantastic job!

name: Josh Ritchie
text:
One of our employees accidentally broke their key off in our lock this morning. I called 2 other locksmiths and no one could get by to look at it today. Finally, I found the Flying Locksmiths. Their dispatch was very courteous and assured they could get someone out today.

Sure enough, Willis arrived and had the broken key out in minutes. He even diagnosed the issue that was causing our keys to stick in the lock and fixed it too AND made a new copy of the broken key. All in under 15 minutes.

Very impressed by their service and skills and I know they will be the company we use for any future needs.

resp.text: Glad we could get someone out in a timely manner to get the broken key our and make you a new key. Thank you for the kind review Josh!

name: Brandon Fortie
text: 9 locks completed in 1.5 hours with 100% completed to exact way that was wanted. Very courteous and fast. Recommend to everyone

resp.text: We are happy to be able to get all your locks taken care of in a timely manner. Thank you for the recommendation Brandon!

name: Cutler Knupp
text: Used for a re-key on a home. Good service and timely, would use them again.

name: Mary-Margaret Bradford
text: Came to my house within 1 hour on a Friday night. The technician was friendly and knowledgeable. Would definitely use again.

resp.text: Happy to quickly assist you Mary-Margaret!

name: Michal Crowder
text: I had a broken lock after hours and they arrived promptly and were very courteous and professional (and quick!).

resp.text: Glad we could quickly assist with fixing your lock and that you enjoyed our staff! Thank you for the kind feedback Michal!

name: Zachary Bryant
text: Very professional, efficient and someone you can trust. I highly recommend them

name: Martine Hernandez
text: Quick service.  Willis was very professional and courteous.

resp.text: Glad we could provide quick service to you Martine!

name: Carolyn Garrity
text: Flying locksmiths were great!!   They offer same day service and did a great job fixing my front lock!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great 5 star review Carolyn!

name: JL Chestnut IV
text: Willis is super awesome...A1 Top service would not recommend any body else but these guys!!!

resp.text: We are so happy to hear you would not recommend any body else but us! Thank you for the kind review JL!

name: mustafaa abdullah
text: Very professional. Terence great guy communicate well with clients speaks highly of the company.

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed our staff Mustafaa!

name: Joe Brown
text: Awesome’ came in a timely manner and was very professional A+*++

resp.text: Thank you for the kind 5 star review Joe!

name: Banker Advice
text: Jeff helped us out today. Had a small issue with a key not fitting right and he came out the next day and fixed it, no additional cost. Very responsive and when he says he will be there at a certain time, he is. Thank you

name: Micah Williams
text: The locksmith was very professional and fast! Great job!

resp.text: Thank you Micah!

name: Ryan Payne
text: Great service. Would recommend to a friend or use them again if ever locked out again.

resp.text: Thank you so much Ryan! We appreciate the kind review!

name: Christopher Fisher
text: Prompt and professional. The technicians showed up on time, got the work done and were on their way.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review Christopher!

name: Monica Brown
text: Great customer service

name: Threat Advice
text: Great job, very polite and professional.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Nancy R Higgins
text: Great

name: Melinda Nalls
text: Very friendly and wonderful service

resp.text: Thank you, Melinda, for your review!

name: Lib Barnette
text: Terrance took care of the crazy lock right away!! Thanks!!

resp.text: Thank you Lib! Happy we could help!

name: Hugo Enrique reyes Suarez
text:
(Translated by Google) Good attention is missing someone who speaks Spanish

(Original)
Buena atención falta alguien que hable español

name: Jeramy Stainbrook
text: Great service and good price.

name: Sean Carpenter
text: Great professional service.. Someone always answers the phone day or night.  Speedy response time. Fair prices! I would highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: dianne arnett
text: They are an excellent company.   I had a rental condo where the entry keypad battery was dead and guests were scheduled to arrive.  The responded immediately.  Their website is easy to use and always reliable.

name: Robert McManus
text: Great job, very quick!

name: Missi B
text: The technician that was dispatched to my home after I locked myself out was courteous,  professional,  friendly and knowledgeable.   The price was extremely reasonable.   I cant say enough good things.

name: Bud Bouchard
text: Highly recommend Aaron's for professionalism and promptness. Super nice people!

name: Lieba Macias
text: Aaron's was a referral from an employee at a local store in Pensacola that had used their services in the past, and were very happy with the service. We took their advice and are also very happy with our purchase. They fit our tight delivery schedule, and the service from purchase to delivery was outstanding. They were on time, and took the greatest care to protect our product as well as not to do any damage to our property upon delivery. Extremely satisfied, and will not hesitate to refer to friends.

name: Kurt T. Bellow, Jr.
text: Great service. I attempted to change a Kaba Lock to another brand on my condo.  When I realized this was above my skill level, I called Aaron’s and they came out within an hour and completed what I worked on for twice that long.  Responsive and professional.

name: Damon Huckleberry
text: Used them for several services over the years, great!

name: Lora Crosley
text: Had a great experience with this company. Getting ready for an event at my house and bathroom door locked...wouldn't get it opened. Called Aaron's. They were out to my house quickly. Super nice customer service and the price was fair! The locksmith had to replace a broken latch.

name: shelley desousa
text: Love this guy.  Anytime we have to rekey because of staff changes, his company always takes care of it quickly.  I have lost car keys multiple times too and he got me in ti my vehicle.   Very fair prices too.

name: Karen Kelly
text: Billy did an excellent job rekeying all my locks. He wore a mask, and doubled checked all the locks. I will definitely call them again if needed in the future.

name: Carolyn Anderson
text: Wonderful service. Staff kind and very efficient

name: Bernard Cook
text: Timely appointments, techs call ahead, arrive on time. However I wanted damaged hardware replaced but tech obviously misunderstood, locks were re-keyed & left as is.

name: Timothy OBrien (Printing Pros)
text: Aaron's arrived within 15 minutes and was done re-keying our lock and making us several keys in even less time than that. Very polite technician. We would definitely used their services again!

name: Cristina Gregory
text: Joe Brown owns this business & I wouldn't trust anyone else!

name: James Sutherland
text: Nice guy took care of my problem.

name: Emmie Crump
text: Very professional and kind service. Thank you Brian for fixing our door quickly. I will recommend you to any friends in the future.

name: Tony Raco
text: She was rude and couldn't hear me on the phone. She had her kids in the background asking her questions. They were $30. More than the company I chose. My service I picked was polite and very reasonable. Never use this service!

name: Greg Palmer
text: Your Employee was casing out my house . Let him know I will be in there waiting next time.

name: Corey Covington
text: 95$ Way to Expensive. And the flat rate is crazy. If it takes 10 - 15 mins; i could understand but less than a min. The worst part a guy in parking lot had the same kit and was fixing to help me for free

name: Daisy Peke
text: Doug is the best! He came and unlocked my car today at the beach and seriously saved the day. He was friendly, fast and very good with communication. In addition to all of that,  the process took less than an hour!! 5 Stars in my opinion. Thanks again Doug!

resp.text: Thank you Daisy!

name: Tracy Wood Jones
text: We were in a particularly difficult situation and the young girl who answered my call on a Sunday evening was fantastic and very caring and the technician who opened our car for my 17yr old son was prompt and awesome as well! Thank you so much! I would highly recommend Aaron's Lock Service.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jason Wheeler
text: Thank you so much Brian!! I will be recommending Aaron's Lock Service to everyone. I can't remember the last time all the locks in my house worked, let alone being the same key. I'm glad to finally have a company I can trust. I had a bad experience with another locksmith company, and it left a bad taste in my mouth. On top of repairing all our locks, Brian wired up a new doorbell button. (He saw it in a box sitting on the counter and offered) I also appreciate him helping my wife carry in the groceries. lol.

name: Courtney Odom
text: Eric helped us get back into my cousins car after she locked herself out. Very fast and efficient at his job. Highly recommend

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jessica Wallace
text: Got to our vacation rental to find out we couldn’t get the door open. Called around to several places, the receptionist was helpful and polite, they came quickly and he made sure the  job was done right. Amazing customer service! I highly recommend!!!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Beth Putman
text: No answer

name: Holly Reineck
text: We had a situation arise at our business this morning at 8AM and we needed all of our locks changed on a Friday before the weekend!  Billy, our technician, literally arrived not even 20 minutes later and had the job done within an hour!  We are very pleased with the work and will be using them for all our future needs!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: philip reed
text: Outstanding customer service!!!

name: Jim Neal
text: Aarons lock was great to do business with. The service rep was very helpful. answered all our questions. Great experience.

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

name: KnK Rupp
text: Called for service when locked out of van. Dispatcher said 30 minutes...1 hour later when we called back she had not dispatched anyone because she said our phone number didn't show on her caller i.d. and she would call locksmith then. Called her back in 10 minutes to make sure she secured someone and she didn't remember talking to me, dispatching someone now.  Total wait of 2 hours later we got unlocked.  Brian was awesome, 5 minutes and he was done. Dispatch and her customer service was horrible.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. It made us aware of an issue that had to be addressed.  No customer should experience what you did. We would be happy to discuss this experience with you if you call 251.967.1919. Usually when people call us wanting an immediate response, they are already having a tough day. We work hard to help that day be better because they called us, not worse! Please accept our sincerest apologies for the way you were treated.

name: Holly Reineck
text: We had a situation arise at our business this morning at 8AM and we needed all of our locks changed on a Friday before the weekend!  Billy, our technician, literally arrived not even 20 minutes later and had the job done within an hour!  We are very pleased with the work and will be using them for all our future needs!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Greg Summerford
text: Timely and efficient

name: Gerry Thompson
text: We installed an programmable lock on our condo a little over a year ago.  It worked until recently - we contacted Aaron's Lock Service and they had a tech out the next day.  He was able to reprogram our lock and it is working again. Good Job!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Joey Conwill
text: Aaron's was called out to our condo by someone that said they were staying there, had them sign a form then destroyed the lock to let them . It was a combination lock and there was a hidden key that would have overridden the lock if someone had bothered to contact the owner, or called the emergency number posted at the condo office, where a manager lives on the grounds. Aaron's said that was standard procedure, as long as the person signed the form, they could let them in. That's nice for all condo owners to know! Total cost to replace lock, almost $400. Aaron's took no responsibility. Not much integrity at this business.

resp.text: Integrity matters as well as ethical business practices.  We value and employ both in our business.  Emergency response locksmith technicians are there to help in challenging circumstances.  We do everything we can to gain entry before we considering drilling the lock.  This is a last resort.  We are sorry your lock was damaged but your renter misrepresented themselves as having authority to do so and chose to assume liability for such activity, just as they choose to assume liability for their treatment of the rest of your property when they rent from you.  With thousands of condos and hundreds of condo offices that are often closed or unmanned, we cannot track down every owner.  This is why we work hard to go above and beyond the minimum of what the law requires.  We love our customers, we love what we do and we work hard to do it well with integrity.

name: John Morrison
text: They could open the locked door but could not remake the key for 2013 Honda Civic..Unlock it for me did both for 125.00 and within an hour.

name: Connie Wagner
text: Great service.....timely, reasonably priced!!

name: Mark Tillema
text: Excellent service! Friendly and quick!

resp.text: Thank you Mark!

name: chase moses
text: Got here quick and had the job done quick. And at a fair price. Would absolutely call them again

resp.text: Thank you

name: Wendy Sclater
text: Very prompt and professional service. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Daniel Botts
text: Very professional and prompt. Thank you Aaron's Lock Service for your group.

name: Linda Chancey
text: We waited for an hour. The guy was suppose to call us when he got close and NEVER DID. When we called to complain the woman tried to accuse us of being drunk and hung up on us. When I couldn't hear her question she also decided to yell in my ear. Do yourself a favor and go with someone else. Ill never call this place again I can tell you that.

resp.text: I know this was some time ago, but I did want to respond.  No customer should encounter this type of treatment and the individual who is no longer with us.  We are sorry this was the treatment you encountered but anyone calling Aaron's will not receive this type of treatment.

name: Stephen Lee
text: Doug, shoes up on time and did exactly what we agreed to over the phone. Very profesional and freindly.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Laurie Jackson
text: Fast service to re - keying locks.   Very kind and clean.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: brenna stewart
text: terrible service. was told it would be a 30 minute wait.  called back 40 mins later and they were supposedly on the way. called again 1 hour and 10 minutes after the first call and was told no one was coming out because i sounded drunk over the phone. i am 16 and definitely WAS NOT drunk. so, needless to say my car was not unlocked by them. TERRIBLE SERVICE WOULDNT RECOMEND TO ANYONE. only rating 1 star because that’s the lowest i can go.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback.  It made us aware of an issue. We addressed that issue to ensure no customer experiences what you did.  We would be happy to discuss this experience with you if you call 251.967.1919.  Usually when people call us wanting an immediate response, they are already having a tough day.  We work hard to help that day be better because they called us, not worse!  Please accept our sincerest apologies for the way you were treated.

name: Mark Curtis
text: Fast service and no damage to car. Highly recommend

resp.text: Thank you for your review and for your business.

name: TJB
text: Locked our keys in the car and since the battery was dead On Star couldn't open it remotely. They called Aaron's and about 20 minutes later their locksmith Billy came out. He couldnt have been nicer. He unlocked the car in about a minute and then helped us jumpstart the car. Total pro and a really nice guy. Would highly reccomend Aaron's to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Libby Shepard
text: We have a camper that we keep on our property in Gulf Shores. Somehow our dogs (2 Cane Corso) lock us out, the key was inside the camper. After calling around to a few places, that said they would be several hours, an RV repair shop said to call Aaron’s. They said they could be there within the hour. Less than 20mins later Billy showed up and within 5 mins had us in the camper! He’s my hero! Thanks so much for everything!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Keith Sharp
text: Very good customer service, was a little slow in getting to job but could have been factors that were uncontrollable. My keyless locks's battery had died -guest could not get in, they dixed everything and only charged $100 on Memorial day weekend.  Would use again

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Cyndi C
text: Received prompt professional service. The locksmith was able to remove a jammed lock from a house door. It wasn’t easy but the technician stuck with it even when I was ready to have him cut the lock out of the door.  Thankfully will now only have to replace the lock and not the whole door.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: The Smiths Keeping it Real
text: They were very professional. Arrived in a timely manner!! Car was unlocked in five minutes.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Addison Patterson
text: super reliable and honest company.

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

name: Jodi Donald
text: Aaron's Lock is our go-to locksmith for all our business needs at Kutter's. They show up on time and do the job right!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: lisa owens
text: Very friendly great price. I ended up not needing them but glad to know I can count in them next time!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Brian Moyer
text: Good guys. 👍

resp.text: Thank you!  I agree!

name: Devon Whyte
text: They are very experience.

name: Keelie Yowe
text: Great customer service always! Great prices on ammo and guns - great selection as well. Highly recommended for all your personal protection needs! FIVE STARS!

name: Jaime K
text: This is the BEST local gun shop in Birmingham. The best customer service around... Plus, the gun and ammunition prices are the BEST in town! Highly recommended!! 5 STARS!!

name: Casey McDonald
text: Wonderful experience with this place. The guys helped me pick out a gun for my fiancée, and gave me a good deal on ammo for it. Liked em so much that I decided to get a shotgun as well. Only positive things to say about this place and the employees.

name: Nancy Wilson
text: Excellent service.  Will shop here again for a gun once the market gets better.  It is hard to find anything anywhere and the owner said to just be patient they are working on getting some in.

name: Austin Park
text: Always super helpful and friendly. Well stocked on ammo everytime ive been in there. Dont have much experience with pre-covid ammo prices, but from what ive found they are very fair with their mid-covid prices

name: Fernan Woodson
text: The guys were really nice and helpful as they could, but every-time i try to patronize this establishment there is some sort of discrepancy. Either lack of knowledge on certain firearms or the product I am looking to purchase is conveniently out of stock.  I wouldn’t waste my time going in there.

name: Phil Thomas
text: Have bought and traded here , Best place to shop . Great guys to work with. 5 STAR OR MORE ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: Joshua Almond
text: I had an awesome experience at this store, i called looking for ammo and they had it in stock at an awesome price. Russell was very friendly and their firearm and accessory selection looked awesome to me! They earned a lifelong repeat customer in me for their honesty, professionalism, courtesy, and clear communication skills. Thanks again Russell!

name: Denie Girardeau
text: CASH ONLY, PEOPLE..No debt cards, or charge cards. Will not even give you change or cash back to make a transaction.  cash must be exact!  He knows  ammunition is scarce.  Others buyers must have caught him on a good day.  Will never buy there again.

name: Brad Peak
text: Nice store, lots of guns and super friendly.  I didnt feel rushed or pressured to buy anything and the guy took the time to answer all my questions. Very knowledgeable!  Visiting Alabama Guns is always a great experience!

name: GT Abraham
text:
This how the phone conversation went...

Me: Hello, I was calling to see if you have a certain ammo in stock.

Guy: wHat dO yOu NeEd?!

Me: Some 9mm hollow points.

Guy: NO!

Me: Okay thank you.

In short the dude was incredibly rude and short for no reason.

Look elsewhere.

name: Amanda Nutton
text: Very helpful, and knowledgeable.  I will be a returning customer.

name: aman babwari
text: Best Customer Service Ever. They Will Have My Business In The Future.

name: Preston Holloway
text: Great place. Got stocked up on .380 for the Zombie Apocalypse.

name: Donovan Donald
text: Owners a great guy and the customer service is superb. Great deals and varied selection.

name: jason hall
text: Visited Alabama Guns and Outdoors today to pick up a new pistol and couldn’t be happier.  Great selection on pistols, shotguns and rifles.  The guys working were super friendly and provided great customer service.  Ffl transfers are available here as well.  A great local business providing service to the people of Shelby County and all of Alabama.  Give these a guys a look for your next firearm related purchase, you won’t be disappointed.

name: Brad Plaxco
text: Super good guys! Always try to shop there first.

name: Tyler Richards
text:
Don't let the size of the store fool you, their selection of firearms is exceptional. Being in law enforcement, I have had many gun purchasing experiences and consider Alabama Guns and Outdoors one of my best yet.

For first time gun owners looking for a comfortable buying experience, look no further. You don't find gun businesses with an atmosphere and owner like this often.

name: PressStart ToRetry
text: Very nice guys and willing to help with whatever you need. Stopped in just to look around and enjoyed the conversation while I was there. Made a small purchase and the owner gave me a discount. I will definitely shop here again.

name: Gerardo Hernandez
text: This gun shop is arguably one of the best in Birmingham even though it may not be the largest. The staff has and continues to be very respectful and insightful to all patrons and I personally have a very positive experience every time I go. The selection of firearms is great and good quality; although it may not have the largest they do carry worthwhile guns and equipment worth buying. It is an overall great place for first-time gun-buyers as well as the experienced.

name: Alexandra Gomez
text: I am so happy I was able to buy my first gun from Alabama Guns & Outdoors. Everyone was very helpful and nice. They took their time to show me guns and helped me choose the perfect one for me. Russell even took the time to show me how to break down my gun and put it back together. If you're in need of buying a gun, you should definitely go see them. Thank y'all so much!

name: L Ferg
text: Bought my first gun from here last week. The owner is incredibly nice and knowledgeable. I had my daughter with me and he made her feel safe around the guns. This is going to be the only place I go!

name: daniel smith
text: Great people, great selection, and even better prices. I picked up a glock 27 g3 today and couldn't be any more satisfied. I recommend doing business here even if you have to travel a little. I will definitely be going back for my next purchase.

name: Toys World
text: Poor products from china. Go somewhere else.

name: Mattress City
text: Staff was great! Gave me excellent advice for the kind of holster that I needed and great information about using my new 9mm

name: JP
text: Great place to buy firearms. Staff is very friendly and don't hassle you to buy anything. They always thank you for coming in.

name: Camille Hantla
text: Came in to buy a gun box for my boyfriend so he could fly his service gun home after moving me across country to Birmingham. After many laughs with these guys (and candy! 😜), we left super pleased and were even offered the gun box and a keychain can of mace, free of charge. What a way to be welcomed to the area! Thanks, gentlemen!

name: Alexandria Nichols
text: Excellent staff! Go to place for ammo! Great selection in guns and extremely helpful advice!

name: Guerney Pierce
text: As always great friendly service, good honest prices and knowledgeable staff! I personally Highly recommend!

name: Alexandria Nichols
text: Excellent staff! Go to place for ammo! Great selection in guns and extremely helpful advice!

name: Matthew Chapman
text: Knowledgeable staff and always friendly!

name: Jessica Ayala
text: Amazing guys. Very knowledgeable and helpful. Really made sure they found the perfect gun for me.

name: Karen Lott
text: New guns, new ammo, new holsters, great store, great prices, great people, great service!

name: stetson cupp
text: Very friendly and reasonable. I recommend this place

name: Kent Farmer
text: Sign on door said ( open ) at 10:30 so I came back at 10:45 only to find sign hanging on door that said ( closed today open tommorow ) so I went to Mark's & bought a safe !!!

name: Royricus Mose
text: They are the best greets you as soon as you walk in prices aren't to bad and they know wat they are talking about

name: Dalton Baldwin
text: Great place to get a gun. Friendly staff that actually care about the customers.

name: Damien
text: Excellent customer service, comfortable atmosphere and competitive pricing.

name: Adrian Diaz
text: Excellent prices and friendly customer service.

name: William Brooke
text: Very friendly environment. Nice selection of product as well.

name: Jonathan Warren
text: Coming back in soon to buy a new gun!! Great customer service and great selection!

name: Alec Faucett
text:
SHUTUP BO! YOU CANT BASE A REVIEW ON A WHOLE STORE JUST OFF THEIR WEBSITE.

THIS IS A GREAT STORE! I WILL NOT BUY A GUN FROM ANYWHERE ELSE EVER AGAIN. SINCE THE DAY I BOUGHT MY FIRST GUN FROM THEM A FEW MONTHS BACK I HAVE BOUGHT TWO SINCE THEN AND AMMO. THEY HAVE KNIFES, SAFES, HOLSTERS ETC. THE OWNER IS A VERY NICE GUY AND KNOWS ABOUT ANYTHING YOU WANT TO KNOW ABOUT A GUN, AMMO OR ANYTHING ELSE TO DO WITH FIREARMS. HE WILL BE COMPLETELY HONEST AND TELL YOU EXACTLY HOW HE FEELS ABOUT A PATICULAR GUN, RATHER HE THINKS ITS A GOOD GUN OR A PIECE OF CRAP AND CAN TELL YOU WHAT TO DO TO IMPROVE ITS PERFORMANCE. HE DOESNT TRY AND LIE TO YOU JUST TO SALE YOU SOMETHING. HIS PRICES ARE GOOD AND HE HAS A LOT OF INVENTORY. IF YOU ARE A GUN COLLECTOR OR JUST GETTING YOUR FIRST GUN, WHATEVER IT MAY BE, I HIGHLY RECOMMENED THIS STORE.

name: Sherilynn “Jazzy” Ivy
text: Great deals! Very informative of inventory!💪💪💪

text: Great atmosphere and customer service

text: Good folks friendly great price

text: Good prices no pressure salesman

name: WSO 2017
text: Extremely satisfied,  excellent customer service

name: Jay Painter
text: Deals.

name: Ginny Dunsirn
text: Great customer service

name: Ronald Jackson
text: This place can get all my money.

name: William Parker
text: Get'em here

name: BG Iradji
text: Nice store.  Lots of inventory

name: Bo Crowder
text: Website suxxx

name: Allstar Pool & Spa
text: Alabama Guns and Outdoors is the place to go

name: Robert Whitehead
text:
To my knowledge, this is one of only two places in the state where you can buy a Fort Knox safe. (The other one is in Florence, and is owned by the same family.) Fort Knox safes are probably the beefiest and best-made safes the average consumer can buy.

This merchant works out of a structural steel building on the same property as their home, so if you drive up the driveway, turn left at the top and you'll see the building.

This is not a plush showroom; think of it more like a warehouse. It's not fancy, but the prices are reasonable, and the staff is very knowledgeable. They do sell other brands (including imports from China), but Fort Knox is their best brand; they even carry vault doors.

The purchase price does not include delivery, and delivering the safe into a building incurs a variable fee, depending on the difficulty of setting it in place. You can send a video of the path into the final position to the merchant, and they can decide what the fee will be.

I enjoyed working with the sales staff (especially their rodent-control specialist, a 17-year-old brindled cat with a sweet personality), but unless you live nearby, I think I would recommend visiting their Florence location, as the trip from Huntsville took about two hours and ran through the Bankhead Forest.

name: Cage Williamson
text:
Called today to get a quote plus information on a gun safe to meet my specific needs. When I told the sales representative that I was looking for a safe with "fireproof" and "waterproof" ratings, she started talking over me and rudely "educating" me on how "those specifications do not exist". She claimed all other gun safe manufacturers with those specifications are liars. Rather than try to kindly educate a new customer on safe specifications to meet my needs, she instead spent her time trying to tear me down.

I had $1500 ready to spend today on an entry-grade home safe but I'll go elsewhere.

resp.text: Mr. Williamson, we sincerely appreciate your feedback and regret that you’ve had this experience. We’ve addressed the incident, and hope that you’ll consider us for your gun safe needs in the future. If you wish to reach the owner directly, please give Daryl  Rowe a call at 205-269-8569. We hope that you have a great day.

name: Robert Ryan
text: Daryl Rowe cares about his customers.  He delivered and installed my beautiful Fort Knox safe.  The installation was smooth and placed perfectly,   They are true experts who took double care to protect the floors with cloth and steel.   They were quick and efficient.  Showed me all the features and made sure I knew how to work the lock before he left.   You can't go wrong with Southland Safes.

name: Todor Marangozov
text: This place is not good for SEMI trucks. Avoid it !  My truck was there 6 hours for free. They didn't have people to unload. It was Friday 19:00pm when the truck was empty. They don't care about you and how much money you are losing. No detention, no respect....

name: John Harris
text: Great service and price. Huge selection

name: Matt Anderson
text: Well worth the drive.  Have a good selection of safes with great pricing.  For those of you not willing to move the safe yourself they offer delivery to your home and into the home as well for reasonable costs.  He showed up with my safe on time and laid down protection to keep my home from being damaged moving the safe into my office.  I highly recommend these fine folks.

name: Russell Sullivan
text: Great selection great pricing!

name: Douglas Max Young II (maxzmillion)
text: Today was my first time interacting with the company. I talked with Nancy. I was asked by my business partner to call and find out what options we had to get into a steel door with a keycode lock where the batteries had died. At some point the packet with the keys had been lost either during transit or by the end customer. When I told her that I was calling on behalf of my business partner, she immediately cut me off and told me "I already told him once that he has to contact Browning because he has to replace that whooole lock system. They only have one set of keys per lock and their all different keys so he's going to have to replace that whole thing". The delivery of this was with a very transactional tone so the customer service aspect was not great. One of the reasons that I was calling her was to verify what model of lock they actually sold our customer but after the initial interaction, I really didn't want to talk to her further so I called the next company in the chain of distribution. The problem with the lock system that was sold is that it is electronic and the batteries lock to the inside so there is no access once they die unless you have a key, and if there is no key, then you are looking at a major intervention. Again, I'm not blaming this company for the loss of the key, just a note about the transactional nature of the customer service.
